title: Graduate Certificate in Herbal Medicine Archives | American College of Healthcare Sciences
cleaned_text: Bell](https://achs.edu/blog/2013/11/16/interview-with-lori-bell/) "I want to try natural remedies for healing and holistic health, but I don't know where to start." Lori Bell (an American College of Healthcare Sciences alumna) often heard this lament at farmer's markets while selling natural products through her homegrown business, Sun Kissed Herbal.
